message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great value and I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too high for my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go as low as $100. How about we meet in the middle at $130? It's a great compromise and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $110, but that's as high as I can go.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to be reasonable, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to make one more compromise - how about we meet at $125? It's still a bit higher than your budget, but I think it's a fair price for the product.
